data.name: Jett for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Jett is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. He has a very handsome body. Do you think he has more chances to make a good career as a gigolo? Do you want to try how good he would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages. By default the male organ is Off, but in the settings room you can turn it on and switch between the different available organs. When you will play with Jett you will also get him as Steam Achievement.

Jett was born in Debrecen, Hungary to a middle-class Jewish family from Russia and Poland. His father, was a physicist, and his mother a book editor and she spoke fluent German and French.

Jett was a very good student at school and graduated from high school with honors, he was really excellent student.

After the high school he was working as a teacher in Debrecen.

Jett left the teaching profession to pursue a legitimate acting career. He has said that he learned then what it was like to be broke, making no money as an actor, but Jett soon found work posing for Playgirl after his then-girlfriend submitted his photo to the magazine. Jett utilized this opportunity as a springboard into the adult industry, he want to become gigolo, which he viewed as a reliable means of supporting himself.

So, help Jett to take his place on the street!

data.short_description: Jett is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
